segments.text: Could you tell me your education background ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where did you go to university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to the university of Ohio , in America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got a bachelor ’ s degree .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I majored in English and minored in Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was you G . P . A ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I graduated with honors . I had a 3.9 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you plan to pursue further education ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ d like to obtain a master ’ s degree in international relations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you think you will do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After I have 3-4 years of work experience .
segments.speaker: S2
